unnormalised: Flash sales, eh? They remind me of a chaotic Diwali mela in Chandni Chowk! Everyone's scrambling for a bargain. Just hope the "sale price" isn't like that scene in "3 Idiots" where Rancho makes up definitions. You end up spending more than if you went to Big Bazaar normally. Better to wait for the next one, yaar!
